mods.name: Melee Enhancement
description:
A few tweaks to Zer0 and Krieg to enhance their melee gameplay

Zer0
Fearless increases shield recharge delay, and Kunai no longer inflict self damage
Krieg
Silence the Voices self-hit chance scales down, and Buzz Axe Bombadier causes slag explosions
mods.tagline: A few tweaks to Zer0 and Krieg to enhance their melee gameplay.

mods.name: Shield Recharge Timer
description: Displays a configurable timer on your HUD that counts the seconds before your shield starts to recharge
mods.tagline: A shield recharge timer for your HUD

mods.name: Spare Parts
description: Allows you to salvage parts from items and attach them to other items.
Just select an item from your backpack, hover over another item
and press the 'salvage' hotkey. Default is [C]
Note: the item you salvage parts from will be destroyed in the process.
mods.tagline: Salvage parts from items and attach them to other items.
